::Autofire::

Autofire turns and lands near Fireblade after hearing the call for
help. He looks the other Decepticon over, seeing how damaged he was.

"Here, I'll get you back to base," he says, picking up the smaller
transformer and transforming to his vehicle mode. Fireblade now inside
the seating area of Autofire, Autofire blasts off toward the base
again. An increadibely fast shell from Incarcinator nearly slams into
him, but misses, Autofire firing back with chain guns and missiles.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> ::FireBlade::
> FireBlade heard the command and tried to get away but his legs 
> failing him. He started using his arms to drag himself across the 
> ground.
> "Autofire...Help me..." he screamed the first time ever he had ever 
> asken for assistance.
